channel.title: I wanted to add 2 npcs
channel.description:
OK I wanted to add 2 npcs (Kign Arthur) into my server thats say somethnig like "Welcome to Mupescape v2!" Then... "Just train and your on your way to owning." I added it in autospawn.cfg like this [code]spawn = 251 3012 3361 0 0 0 0 0 1 King Arthur spawn = 251 3013 3361 0 0 0 0 0 1 King Arthur[/code]
I not sure for code in client.java so can someone help me with it?

item.title: I wanted to add 2 npcs
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

I did hit tab
I just want to know the code for client.java
anyone got? [br][size=1]Posted on: October 15, 2007, 04:39:15 PM[/size][hr]lol I just realized I put a 0 at the end when I was suppost to put a 1

spawn = 251 3012 3361 0 0 0 0 0 1 King Arthur spawn = 251 3013 3361 0 0 0 0 0 1 King Arthur

Read full topic

item.title: I wanted to add 2 npcs
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

spawn = 251 3012 3361 0 0 0 0 0 0 King Arthur spawn = 251 3013 3361 0 0 0 0 0 0 King Arthur

And make sure you press tab instead of space bar inbetweeen places

Read full topic
